name: Theory of Light
description:
In short terms a minimal "Survival / Clicker" game combo.

The idea behind ToL is to make white survive the dark.

In digital design principles color white is generated with 255 Red / 255 Green / 255 Blue.

This game focused around this concept.

Players sends R-G-B beams to the center Light Core to keep it at white. Each beam has a value, refill and a bounce rate. When the Light Core is at white state it generates Light consumable to upgrade "Value", "Refill", "Bounce".
